Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: In a perfect world, they would either be working their hearts out attempting to make it viable in which case, fine, either it works out or not. But if they start giving up, just cash in all the usd/btc/eth you have from the project and give it back to the token buyers.  But of course that will never happen since everyone likes to scam so much. Especially the ICO nonsense.  I, for one, was pretty floored by how shitty the project development on Bitclave was. I know development is super difficult in general but if I were in charge of the project and dragging feet with suboptimal employees I'd still probably be crushing in progress relative to what they've been able to accomplish in the same amount of time just because I know how efficient I can be when I care. Most people don't share those types of values/goals though.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Important Announcement  —  Oct 1, 2018   Dear Community Members,  BitClave is entering a new phase of product and business development where we aim to apply our blockchain solutions to benefit mainstream businesses. We are working hard to turn our vision into reality by creating an open, public, decentralized marketplace. To get our latest development status, please visit:  -    https://www.bitclave.com/ -    Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/BitClave/) -    Twitter (https://twitter.com/BitClave/) -    Telegram BitClave News Channel (https://t.me/Bitclave), BitClave Ecosystem (https://t.me/BitClaveEcosystem).  We greatly appreciate your support. If you have further questions, please feel free to contact us at https://www.bitclave.com/contact

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: I would like to know if the team will improve the quality of general search (not crypto search) so that the search results look more like those from google or yahoo.  For example, when you search a certain word like “tomato”, the outputs are presented in several categories like websites about tomato, images of tomato, videos of tomato, news about tomato, and so on.  I would really like to use desearch instead of google one day.  Also, does the team have a plan of promoting desearch?  I would imagine that plenty of people would switch to desearch if they know the advantages, and if it works well as google.  I don’t have much knowledge of the inner works of search engines so I might have oversimplified things.  To be honest, I’m very impressed that you have built such a search engine like desearch on BASE.  Hopefully the team could improve it and promote it fast

Author: Ukraine2020
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Updates to Privacy Policy and Terms of Service  Bitclave has recently made some updates to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy The policies apply to all Bitclave customers and users. In short, here are the updates:  Transparency: We’ve reworded our privacy policy to make it easier to understand what personal data we collect, how we collect and process the data, and for what purposes. We also explain how we store, transfer, and share personal data Control: We make it easy for you to control the information you provide to us. Our policy explains how you can make choices about your information, and the measures we’ve put in place to keep your information secure. At any time, you can request information about the personal data we collect, request that we correct or erase certain personal data, or request that we stop processing your personal data in certain ways GDPR: We’ve included additional language to discuss rights for users located in the European Union (EU) We encourage you to review the  Terms of Service and Privacy Policy and familiarize yourself with the changes that are being made. If you have any questions please reach out to us using contact information provided in the Privacy Policy.  https://docsend.com/view/tg9252j  https://docsend.com/view/kwc9dv6

Author: MadGamer
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Here is a little advice for everyone here (I'm hodling Bitclave).  There still a lot of to improve. If IIRC, I read on Telegram that they are currently relying on Google for some of the data which is wrong If you want to make a decentralized search engine that is supposed to compete with the current ones. Not to mention that you can't really load much, It's only one page and the inaccurate data regarding wallets (probably not their fault, but the source they are getting info from) etc.  The list may go on and on but the fact that we are receiving weekly updates is very promising and that's not something all projects are doing. My advice is that If you really believe that this team is going to deliver, then stay away from FUD, send your funds to a hardware wallet and forget them. If not, just sell everything you have and let people do whatever they want.

Author: skip60
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Q - What is BitClave doing for privacy of data? Have they looked into solutions like Enigma, Starkware, or Keep network?  A - Base the blockchain by itself is private nobody including BitClave has access. Your right through the contract are visible but if you know ETH they plan on updating the code for private smart contracts. Either way the Data is kept private. All that will be seen is the CAT transaction on the Network so no issues with data breach  Also bitclave don’t plan on staying on ETH. They build in the API to be able to jump chains when one becomes available

Author: skip60
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Q - What distinguish BitClave from Brave project?  A - They are both taking on the marketing industry. Brave throws banner adds in front of you in order to get BAT. One of the first attempts to tackle the industry. Unfortunately if you think about it it’s not going to be very sustainable as companies will be paying and getting less conversion { this is just my thoughts }  BitClave is built around 3 sectors  - Privacy - Search - Marketing  that means is as you look for suff the search engines now track and collect data on you without any compensation. But BASE the BitClave blockchain will track your data and keep it encrypted so when the marketers or companies perform marketing campaigns they can target the exact people they want to attract through smart contracts. On top of Search it is also an open source for third party DAPPS. What that means is anyone can build on top of the BASE blockchain.  to be continued.....

Author: skip60
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: ......continues  Think about it this way. Think of MatchICO as a third party DAPP it just so happens BitClave build it. BASE will be able to monetize every sector that is currently owned by third party marketers. realtor.com / hotels.com / autotrader.com / vacations.com CAT  All these are all third party website they don’t do anything except take your data and take money from the company to show you offers. With BASE all those activities will be tracked by a single source and that’s BASE where google can only extend to google for its data collection BASE will be able to give you better more personal offers. This is much much much bigger than what people think.

Author: Cryptocurrencies News
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: BitClave Takes Center-Stage with Blockchain-Powered Search Engine  https://medium.com/bitclave/bitclave-takes-center-stage-with-blockchain-powered-search-engine-2963f28b5320   Ever imagined the possibility of having all your crypto and blockchain related topics and keyword searches in one place? Or even the security that comes with knowing that there are no centrally controlled algorithms which take advantage of your digital footprints and browsing patterns on your favorite search engine? Imagine the efficiency, accuracy and security that such an engine can deliver!  That’s exactly what BitClave’s search engine, Desearch, offers.  Desearch enters the search engine ecosystem as BitClave’s answer to all user concerns over centralized control of the existing search engine providers, eliminating once and for all the problems and ambiguities in searching for specialized content (such as cryptocurrency and blockchain related information), the overbearing influence of service providers on such content owners, and exploitation of private data for advert revenue generation.  Desearch is able to eliminate these existing shortcomings by leveraging the BitClave ecosystem on the revolutionary blockchain technology. By virtue of this innovation, you can now get all your crypto information needs and curiosities in one easy dashboard, but without the bother of interfering ads or the age-long worries of invasion of your privacy.  How It Works  Essentially, the Desearch engine is an expansion of existing crypto-centric websites such as Coinmarketcap, Coincap, Coindesk, Cointelegraph, Crypto Answers, Coin Calendar, etc. and official websites, blogs, social links, and other digital resources of cryptocurrency concerns. But instead of serving as just another news or market information source that is still dependent on existing centralized search engines, Desearch acts as a decentralized pool for all the information and data resources of these specialized crypto-centric sites. This way, users have all the industry-related information in one place, with the extra benefit of searches being more focused and results more accurate and, of course, all the problems with centralized dependence engines are eliminated.  An Intuitive Search Algorithm  Besides the benefits of a decentralized ecosystem, the Desearch engine is also distinguished by its optimized, intuitive search algorithm which delivers a better experience when surfing, because it connects intelligently with the most trusted, relevant websites to gather the essentials on any search keywords. Furthermore, Desearch’s powerful search capability also looks through the top sites used in the Blockchain space, searching Telegram channels, BT, company and influencer Medium content, and Reddit, always going for the deepest dive on ICO and all crypto information — and that at the speed of lightning!  With a streamlined and specialized focus, Desearch is invaluable to the industry because it is now easier to stay up-to-date on crypto exchanges, find a strong ICO, track your favorite apps and developers, and quickly get the useful content that is restricted on the old search sites. It doesn’t get better!  The Future of Desearch  In line with BitClave’s vision, Desearch.com is designed to be the future of search, with a decentralized search engine that is the ultimate go-to for all types of content on the web. Even more, the BitClave blockchain ecosystem comes packed with even more juice, as it puts more power in the hands of the everyday internet surfer.

Author: AlexBessonov
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: https://img.evbuc.com/https%3A%2F%2Fcdn.evbuc.com%2Fimages%2F44506186%2F243602729548%2F1%2Foriginal.jpg?w=800&auto=compress&rect=0%2C0%2C720%2C360&s=0c25bb868033332eca42ae13a2fab20a  BitClave will host our very first meetup for attendees of Blockchain Week and crypto fans on May 14th! We invite you to join us for the BitClave Consensus Meetup NY in the evening with many Consensus attendees. Let’s tackle the decentralization of the internet and revolution in personal data together!  Data security online is one of the greatest issues of the 21st century, and increasingly in the spotlight. Decentralization will completely change how we share our data online, and who profits from it.  The BitClave meetup will feature presentations and demos of our recent projects, Desearch and Match ICO, and plenty of time to meet the top BitClave leaders and give your in-person feedback. Enjoy mingling with Head of Growth Pratik Gandhi and other members of our marketing and events teams. We will also have live activities with great branded prizes. This will be an exciting opportunity to network with other crypto enthusiasts fresh of the first day of Consensus.  We're thrilled to introduce Desearch and Match ICO to our longtime fans and users, and make many new friends committed to the decentralization of the internet.  Eventbrite page

Author: skip60
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: There was a very usefull post at bitclave telegram topic  İt is better to share  it here for new comers about where bitclave is trying to go   the third party sites that are the middle men the whole project is trying to eliminate. The search engine just like google now will collect your data store it on the blockchain not anyone but you will have access to that data unless you want to share it. Think as BASE search engine as a data collector for the third party builds.  Google doing that now but all that data is used for analytics for the bots to desire what you see when you perform a search. An example. If you go to a friends place right now you won’t get the same search results as if you were home. That’s because you do t have the same data as your friend. Well now it’s no different if you look at my MatchICO vs yours I can guarantee I have more offers than you. That will be the same for cars, homes, insurance you name it any third party builds will have different offers on them based on data. The 2 sites I pasted are middle men. They suck money out of the car industry and Home industry but with base those sites will be linked directly to the dealerships or the realtors and instead of paying the third party they pay you directly. Again I may be way off but I’m 99% sure that’s where they are going.

Author: AlexBessonov
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Development General update Following our announcement last week about three project initiatives, we wrapped up our previous commitments and reallocated our engineering team to staff the announced projects. You will see GitHub activity this week for our Platform project. MatchICO is currently developed in private repositories as these include BitClave’s private IP. These projects will go through refactoring and we will move the functionality that does not include BitClave’s private IP to public repositories.  MatchICO This week we implemented many important features and fixed major bugs:   - Batch processing (processing of transactions in a group) that helped us to accelerate the distribution of token rewards. Do you remember that your rewards were in pending for a long time? Now we fixed it!  - Fixed the wallet verification process. The API of our wallet verification provider was broken and was causing a 500 error. We decided to design out the third party provider and implemented our own solution.  - Launched the referral program. Now everyone can earn 20 CATs if he refers a new investor with a wallet balance more than 1 ETH.  - There were cases where investors searched for offers but did not get any results. A common scenario for this case was when an investor had less funds on his wallet than what a business required as the minimal amount before extending the offer. We implemented a message box notifying investors of these situations. It is important to clarify that MatchICO is a platform facilitating a direct connection between ICO projects and ICO investors. It is the business who decides on the rules of the offer and the investor who decides on search criteria. The MatchICO search engine just follows the rules and matches ICO projects and ICO investors that have matching criterias.  Bitclave.com We redesigned our landing page and are actively implementing the frontend.You will be able to see the new design shortly.  Platform This week we focused on refining the requirements and scope for the 1st deliverable of the Platform project. A lot of work happened including product development like MatchICO (product) and Android BASE (early prototype) in private repositories and as part of technology evaluations in public repositories. We leveraged what we have learned during these phases and now we can define a better implementation plan for our Platform.  The scope for the 1st deliverable of the Platform has the following requirements and goals:   - Deliver the platform with clean, documented API that will be used internally in BitClave products and by our 3rd party partners  - Define an API and abstraction layer between DAPP and Platform layer  - This will allow us to adopt the best decentralized technologies that will be available in the future with minimal disruption to the application layer.  - API for the 1st phase shall cover the following use cases  - Registration  - Updates of personal information  - Authorization of access to personal data to a trusted entity  - Access to the personal information by an authorized parties  - Performance and economics of the deliverable shall be reasonable and be comparable to what is expected in the current centralized world  - To satisfy this requirements some of the capabilities will be implemented using centralized technologies  - The main value of this deliverable is an API for internal and external use and access to the anonymized data that was collected in BitClave products. With this deliverable, BitClave in it s own products and any 3rd party in their products can start using this API and build DAPPs that use and contribute to BASE anonymized data store.  Events/meetings We attended two conferences in Bay Area and several events this week   - Blockchain Protocol Analysis and Security Engineering 2018 at Stanford University - https://cyber.stanford.edu/bpase18  - This conference was very technical and academic as is expected from a conference held at Stanford. It was very encouraging to see hundreds of scientists talking about issues and solutions in blockchain space. You can see new research domains are being developed in academics around blockchain. Seeing this gives us more confidence that blockchain is here to stay. There are many issues with the current blockchain state but the best minds are working on finding solutions to these issues. There was a talk that had a direct relation to the issues that BitClave is attacking and it was about anonymity and linkability by Rebekah Mercer - Mobius. While a “user friendly” presentation is not available yet, here is the link to the research paper https://eprint.iacr.org/2017/881.pdf.  - Blockchain Technology Evolution in US and China - http://www.goblockchainconnect.com/  - One of the popular events in the Blockchain community with attendance of our partners ICON, QTUM and others. We met with several ICOs and continue to see a lot of interest for MatchICO as several more projects will be added to the mix.  - An evening with Jay Clayton - https://law.stanford.edu/event/evening-jay-clayton/  - An interesting panel at Stanford with the SEC head. It was very interesting to listen to Mr. Clayton, who presented his views not just on the state of ICOs,, but the overall view of the global investment climate. As the US government continues to study the phenomena of Blockchain, we see the role of technology companies continuing the path of innovation while making sure they closely follow any new legal developments and regulations.  Marketing We continue our search for Head of Marketing https://angel.co/bitclave/jobs/264172-head-of-marketing. We have made several hires in the marketing team. If you are interested in joining us, please drop us a line.  Community Here we have collected the top questions we have received from our community this week   - Why there is no GitHub activity. Answer: To add more details to the answer given above on this topic. BitClave plays two roles in building the BASE ecosystem. The 1st role is building the open platform to enable 3rd party development and the 2nd role is building Products and Services on top of that platform. A lot of activity happened in building products in BitClave’s 2nd role, but this activity was happening in private repositories on GitHub as it included BitClave’s private IP. The reason we have chosen to focus on products and prototypes 1st (our 2nd role) is to better experience the need of the 3rd parties and to better define the requirements for the platform (our 1st role). We kicked off the Platform project and you will see more and more activity in this direction as we ramp up.  - Why there are so little updates to the community and requests to improve marketing efforts Answer: We hear your feedback. We took actions to improve in this area. As you can already see, we had 3 AMA sessions, we started to publish a weekly newsletter and we are in final stages of hiring and extending our marketing team.  - Why can I see CAT balance on my Bitclave account if I already withdrew tokens Answer: What you see on your BitCalve dashboard right now is the information related to the event of Token Sale. It shows the contribution you made and the tokens you got. This dashboard is NOT a generic CAT wallet at this stage  - Where can I find my tokens after I bought them on your site Answer: You refer to a feature where you can buy / sell CAT. This feature is powered by Bancor. It allows you to buy / sell CAT tokens without any need to register on exchanges or even Bancor. All you need is a MetaMask wallet. All the transactions will happen on the MetaMask wallet. Metamask is a mandatory requirement to use this feature.  - How many tokens should I withdraw Answer: This is completely up to you. You can keep your tokens with BitClave or move to your own Ethereum address.  - Where can I buy these tokens Answer: You can buy the tokens on exchanges, on BitClave site using the Bancor-powered wallet or as a business you can buy tokens in MatchICO.  - What GAS to set up Answer: GAS price fluctuates a LOT in Ethereum network based on the load on Ethereum at the time of transaction. We recommend checking https://ethgasstation.info/ for the average GAS price before you issue your transaction.  - MatchICO: Do we really need to have 0.5 ETH in the wallet constantly to get offers? Answer: Businesses decide on the criteria for their offers and what rewards they are willing to pay for using an investor’s personal information in extending the offer. Businesses might decide they are not interested in extending offers to potential investors that have less than 0.5 ETH on their ETH wallets.

Author: RealCryptOracle
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: I guess that's because: MatchICO is (just) a proof of concept website - which is still in alpha stage. More important is the BASE (Bitclave Active Search Ecosystem) platform, which of course can be found on the website and in the whitepaper. If I understood correctly, the product (MatchICO) is based on the platform (BASE).  Quote https://www.bitclave.com/en/ Alpha BASE platform is under active development and is publicly available on BitClave's GitHub account. The CAT Token is deployed on Ethereum main net and is used as the currency in BitClave’s first product. The product is dubbed MatchICO. MatchICO allows ICO projects to pay contributors CAT tokens in return for the right to use contributor’s personal data while presenting their ICO project.  Quote https://medium.com/@BitClave/bitclave-2018-and-beyond-813df59489da In October, we released the first version of our search product dubbed MatchICO. MatchICO is a proof of concept website where users can receive CAT tokens in exchange for viewing various ICO’s while sharing their data with the listed companies. MatchICO is mainly aimed at demonstrating a new way of direct marketing between consumers and businesses. Businesses pay the consumers directly, avoiding middlemen like Google and Facebook — BitClave’s core idea.

Author: CryptoGrinder
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: This is a reply so I will be "following" this project.  I need to catch up on 2017 trades and taxes soon, a real headache.  Hopefully I won't miss the boat on this one when I get back.  I see it either flopping or popping in 2 month or so, but certainly not stagnating... coins/tokens that do things are going to be the world of 2018/2019.  We thought buying online was crazy when you could go into a store, but here we are.  Next, everyone will want tokens and ownership over their services... and companies will prefer it to hiring employees.  The self-policing store, run by the customers, this will be the best of both worlds if marketed properly!  Best wishes.

Author: cvdesty
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: I would be very happy to see them beat Google at their own game. For far too long we have had to deal with Google's degrading search results, and their unfair business practices of censorship and showing favoritism to big corporations. It's time to put a stop to such crookedness. Substratum and Bitclave will work well together to give us the Internet back we once knew! Now we just need a powerful replacement for Youtube.

Author: RealCryptOracle
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: I can only agree with that.  BitClave (CAT) is definitely the best deal of the week! It follows a very good idea and belongs to the 'Blockchain Service' category. Projects in this area will be the high-flyers of the coming years. Tron (TRX) and Dragonchain (DRGN) have already proven this assessment very impressively.  There are essentially only two serious projects in the 'Decentralized Internet Search' area: Presearch (PRE) and BitClave (CAT) Presearch (PRE) was launched on the markets about a month ago - and has already developed relatively well. BitClave (CAT) has a much higher potential in comparison, not only in my opinion: BitClave (CAT) vs Presearch (PRE)  Presearch (PRE) ICO Token Price: 1 PST = 0.20 USD Today's Token Price after 1 month on the market: 1 PST = 0.67 USD Total Supply: 170,000,000 PRE  BitClave (CAT) ICO Token Price: 1 CAT = 0.10 USD Today's Token Price after 1 DAY on the market: 1 CAT = 0.25 USD Total Supply: 299,798,552 CAT

Author: makebitcoincash
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: As we draw near, many are wondering what prices we will see. Here’s my thoughts and predictions of the prices when Bitclave is listed on the exchanges:  Price prediction Starting price range may be $0.31 — $0.50 where I think some lucky few will perhaps get in for $0.10 — $0.20.  I predict that the bulk of the trading in the first few days will trend up and take place between $0.50 — $0.63 & finally I estimate that the high end at the beginning could taper off between $0.70 — $0.77.  Going forward Outstanding dev team, a promising collaboration with Carnegie Mellon University, actual alpha product on their BASE platform, challenging but disruptive solution.  One issue I do see is transaction speed limitations but that is more a problem involving the whole blockchain ecosystem.  Bitclave is gonna be exciting and one to look out for going into 2018.  As for the future, steady price increase. With the updates, changes and improvements of what’s to come, I place a conservative price point of $1.50 Mid 2018 and around $2.00 — $2.35 EOY 2018. Take this into consideration with a grain of salt.  Possible aspect of the supply One interesting found is the total circulation supply. Currently, most of us think it is around 550m (cirrulation supply). As mentioned - “550,842,000 tokens distributed in token sale or 25,547,000 USD hard cap"  Those were just the general terms of the token sale. But if one were to take a look at their contract https://etherscan.io/token/0x68e14bb5a45b9681327e16e528084b9d962c1a39#balances, by the actual numbers we’re looking at possibly less than 400m in circulation (Total Supply minus top holder which is assumed to be bitclave).  In this case, there could be a big increase in what the actual prices are. Knowing my luck, I’ll probably be sleeping when trading starts so I do hope this isn’t the case. If not, then that’s good since nothing has change.   Reminder, this is not what the actual prices will be. This is just a prediction. The numbers could be overestimated or underestimated. This serves as a guideline and will vary on an individual basis.

The fact that the crowd sale sold out very fast means that there was a high demand with this token so even if people want to offload and bounty hunters will dump their coins, I also believe demand will exceed supply at the 10 cents level which was the original ICO price if I am correct. To see it open at 3 times the ICO price is quite promising Indeed. Of course a x 10 scenario middle of 2018 will be a great vindication for CAT holders.

Author: Artemsv
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Meet Bitclave – the decentralized search engine  BitClave is a blockchain startup developing a decentralized search platform called BitClave Active Search Ecosystem (BASE). BASE revolutionizes how people interact with search engines and online advertisements. It provides compelling alternative to the current walled off garden of online advertising by prioritizing personal privacy and user control over data while supporting a transparent and streamlined process for businesses to reach customer audiences.  How did we get that idea? I have a solid background in cybersecurity, so data privacy has always been among my top interests. I was always very curious about data management and how people can monetize their data. This background eventually led me to the idea of a platform where users have full control of their data versus somebody reselling it. Then we started discussing and brainstorming with our future co-founders – Patrick Tague, Emmanuel Owusu and Vasily Trofimchuck, and after a few brainstorm meetings we started working on several prototypes.  We all had different backgrounds – corporate, academic, startup and decent experience in different industries, including cybersecurity, blockchain, marketing, business development, which is really helpful. Our team is truly international – some of the co-founders are based in the US, some in Singapore, and we also have people in Russia. So, we were building an international project from the very beginning.  https://fintech.xyz/2017/12/24/meet-bitclave-the-decentralized-search-engine/

Body: BitClave ICO Success Story – How Did It Happen? https://www.chipin.com/bitclave-successful-ico/  bitClave, a decentralized search engine that directly connects businesses and consumers through Ethereum-based smart contracts, recently ended its token sale with massive fanfare.  bitclave logoBitClave achieved its hard cap of $25.5 million in just over 30 seconds after the start of the public token sale.  Statistics-wise, BitClave recorded:  Over 13,000 transactions made during the token sale Over 64,000 registered users A distribution of 550,842,000 CAT tokens out of a total supply of 2 billion In today’s article, we’ll look at the factors behind BitClave’s successful token sale.  https://www.chipin.com/bitclave-successful-ico/

Author: Austin69
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: I received an email this morning that it was to be Jan 1  copy/paste = edit apology, the query was regarding the bounty, which this does not address  We have completed most of the KYC process and are now preparing for the full release of the tokens.  One of our main priorities during the token sale was to allow as many people as possible to participate. We had participants from all over the world — a whopping 13821 transactions from 137 countries! While this is a very exciting statistic, it made our KYC procedure more challenging. The team has worked tirelessly through the KYC process and we are able to verify above 98% of our participants. We still need your help to get to 100%. Please make sure you complete the forms to pass the KYC process successfully. You’ll receive a confirmation email and see a green notification on your dashboard after successfully completing the KYC process. If you are not sure about your status, please contact our support team.  Meanwhile, our MatchICO product already has 4803 token holders with more than 35K transactions. We are excited to see so much interest in our product and cannot wait to complete KYC and unlock the tokens for general usage.  With token sale completion within seconds and good progress on KYC, we are way ahead of our schedule. Just recall, our original plan was 4 weeks for token sale and 4 weeks for  KYC. We are beating this schedule by almost a month.  While we are eager to release our tokens as soon as possible, we will begin the token distribution on January 1, 2018 to ensure that all legal requirements are met and ensure a smooth process for all the participants.  We’d like to thank all the contributors again for their participation. We are looking forward to seeing all of you guys using the system in 2018. Happy holidays!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: These are great numbers, but i have to ask, can anyone gain access to eth and btc addresses which were used for pre sale to confirm this info ?  Quote from: EvilDead750 on November 25, 2017, 07:10:06 AM   --- It's exciting to carve out some of Google's insane profit margins. And I don't like the idea of my searches being tracked, saved, and sold. I do see in their White Paper that they can track your purchase/offer ratio. I'm assuming a person with a lower ratio will be much cheaper to send an offer to. And people with a high purchase ratio will be more expensive.  --- As long as the Search Engine actually performs well it will be successful. Ever try BING? It kinda sucks!  I dont see this situation any different from google, google is collecting all this data and using it to generate profit. Maybe not so directly but cost per click is different in locations because certain location is more wealthy. And if your data is saved and sold anonymously i dont see the harm nor the difference in privacy compared to google.

Author: EvilDead750
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: I have 2 legitimate questions about this project.  1) Is this search engine going to preform anywhere near as good as google?  2) Once people start getting paid to search I'm sure people are going to do analytics on their income and share this info. We can figure out what keywords has the most advertising revenue. Then people will be making frequent disingenuous searches in hopes of increasing their own income. This behavior will lead to advertisers not making as many sales per click.  If people are not paid for their searches then they will only be searching because they are truly interested in the topic.  --- It's exciting to carve out some of Google's insane profit margins. And I don't like the idea of my searches being tracked, saved, and sold. I do see in their White Paper that they can track your purchase/offer ratio. I'm assuming a person with a lower ratio will be much cheaper to send an offer to. And people with a high purchase ratio will be more expensive.  --- As long as the Search Engine actually performs well it will be successful. Ever try BING? It kinda sucks!

Author: Kirilp
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Meet the Boss – Exclusive Interview with BitClave CEO Alex Bessonov  BitClave is a decentralized search engine designed to solve the duopoly of Facebook and Google in the digital advertising market which is unfair to users and businesses. The solution proposed is a protocol called BASE, which is the short form of the BitClave Active Search Ecosystem. BASE is a decentralized system that connects end-users directly with businesses that are relevant to their needs and search queries, hence eliminating the need for external ad platforms like Bing Ads or AdWords. With BASE, all you have to do is to perform a search on the BASE app and the platform will automatically connect you with businesses who can satisfy your need directly. We recently sat down with Alex Bessonov, the CEO of BitClave to have a chat with him about the project as well as finding out his thoughts and insights. https://www.chipin.com/bitclave-ceo-alex-bessonov-interview/

Author: Artemsv
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Proof-of-fan. Help us spread the word and be rewarded!  Recently we announced that BitClave hit a new high by raising over $22M out of $25.5M hard cap in the token pre-sale. This success would be absolutely impossible without our community. More than 64,000 users have already signed up for the token sale!  We are extremely grateful for the support coming out of our growing community. We receive a lot of good feedback from our users, who help us from fixing the typos and finding security issues on our website, to promoting our product through news media and YouTube channels! We hope to see even more increased collaboration with the community, and we do believe that any valuable contribution should be rewarded. This is how we’ve come up with the idea of the Proof-Of-Fan (POF) model to help our loyal fans get the the whitelist bonuses.  Participants on the whitelist receive priority queuing during the crowdsale event and are also eligible for individual bonuses. Since we are already oversubscribed for the crowdfunding, we have to close our whitelist on Nov 22 and cancel bonuses for the non-whitelisted members. However, if you are our real fan who believes in the project, and you missed the whitelist deadline but you are very interested in participation, we still can accommodate you.  After Nov 22 you can get subscribed to the whitelist by the Proof-Of-Fan model. Here is how it works: before submitting your whitelist registration, you have to make and publish a video/podcast, an article or a blog post promoting BitClave and send us the link for manual evaluation via the chat on www.bitclave.com. Feel free to publish this on your blog or any social media channels and networks you have access to, including Reddit, Steemit, Facebook, YouTube, Telegram groups, etc. Just share your opinion about BitClave and the problem we are solving.  https://medium.com/bitclave/proof-of-fan-help-us-spread-the-word-and-be-rewarded-c701e173fddb

Author: Tyska
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: The date is set. The BitClave public token sale will start on Nov 29th.  Our project has created a lot of excitement. During the initial Pre-Sale and Deposits, we raised $22M out of $25.5M hard cap. We are oversubscribed for crowdfunding with 64,000 registered users. Thank you for your great support!  As a result, we are closing our whitelist on Nov 22. We are also canceling all bonuses for the non-whitelisted participants. There is a chance we will reach our cap before all whitelisted participants have made their contribution. In this case, the priority will be given to participants who made a deposit.  Due to the recent increase in crypto to USD rate, we might reach our USD cap before reaching the tokens cap. In this case, the unsold tokens will be burned.  Here are the final terms: Toke Sale hard cap 25.5M USD 1 CAT price is 0.10 USD All bonus canceled for not-whitelisted contributors Crypto to USD rate is the highest rate between the Deposit date and Nov 29th  See more details here

When the rest of the tokens will be sold to the market? Which parte will go for the team?  Let´s contribute  Thank you, Joao

Qualified purchasers may not include US residents.  "Tokens are immediately allocated to purchasers after each contribution to a purchaser’s contribution addresses. However, tokens will be available for transfers after the completion of the KYC process which is expected to take up to four weeks following the end of token sale. The tokens allocated during the token sale will have the symbol CAT and version 1.1. After completion of the KYC, the qualified purchasers will be granted with the final tokens. The final tokens will have symbol CAT and version 2.0."

Author: Tyska
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Dear Community! Thank you for your feedback and suggestions. We really appreciate them! The Token Sale launch date will be nailed down and announced till the end of the week. We are currently evaluating several options for the start date. The Bitcoin fork was the only reason for changing the date. While it was a tough decision for us, it was based on the request of our community and our desire to maximize benefits for our supporters. The situation around the Bitcoin fork has been unclear for a while. Although it was officially canceled, there were many rumors and speculations affecting the market. Once everything has settled down, we will immediately announce the launch of the Token Sale. We feel confident the final date will be a win-win for everyone.

Author: Alexbt
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: The Decentralized Internet: The Future of Online Searching  THE ORIGINAL PURPOSE OF THE INTERNET  The internet’s original mission was to build a common neutral network, with equal participation, for the betterment of humanity. After the first dot com bubble, large corporations (such as Google, Facebook, etc.) realized that the largest value gained from this neutral network involved gathering, organizing, and monetizing information through a central server. Therefore, companies built their value by growing huge centralised services on the internet, while disabling the ability to link to content via a URL (i.e. videos uploaded directly onto Facebook get algorithmic preference over YouTube URL’s posted on Facebook) or allowing search engines to index their content (i.e. creating algorithms making it hard to find Facebook videos on Google).  https://medium.com/bitclave/the-decentralized-internet-the-future-of-online-searching-14f05f1eb75e

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Yes, it is legal  Quote from: Taner1 on November 06, 2017, 06:47:11 AM Give my account back. This Russian guy steal my account (password reuse). Don't believe anything he says. Why would you not recover the password? Stop spam, please Information from the help page: Quote If you're trying to login to the forum but have forgotten or lost your password, you can retrieve it with the lost password tool. You can enter either your username or your email address so long as you check the appropriate option, then click the Send button to send yourself an email containing a link to reset your password. It's also possible to avoid the email altogether if you've set yourself a secret question and answer in your profile, but please beware of questions that anyone could answer or guess (like 'what is the first color of the rainbow?', which would be a very bad choice)!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Dear friends! It’s time for the main event — the official BitClave Token Sale is coming!!! We have introduced a few changes to the structure of the token sale based on discussions with our community, advisors and a revised analysis of the current cryptocurrency market. Read about it here: BitClave Token Sale Terms  Also, we are happy to announce the alpha version launch of our first product - www.matchico.com. It’s an important step towards implementation of the project’s philosophy as well as BASE platform kick-off. MatchICO is an example of our platform based application which directly connects ICO projects with investors whereas the latter can receive personalized offers from ICO projects and get paid for sharing their personal data required for investor verification purposes.  The alpha version was launched two weeks ago, but it is already actively used by 150 projects and thousands of investors, which shows a high demand for the CAT token. Our revolution begins right now, since you can already earn a cryptocurrency by conducting the search on the Internet. Sign up, find the ICO project, get a personalized offer and a cryptocurrency reward for its reviewing. Being a valuable prospective investor for an ICO project, you will have and opportunity to receive CAT tokens simply for considering invitations to these projects.

Author: smartJEV
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Scam? How? Anybody asked any penny from you? Its independent insights, which are based on a public information. You can agree with it or not, you can start a discussion about that. Its a brand new site with a good analytical team, nobody asking you to pay for this. Nobody even planing any ICO for this. Who can scam you on it and how? If you find insights useful for you, "thank you" will be enough, if not, start a discussion (we have open comment on a site).  The reason of that is probably that you are related to the Bitclave. (you have 17 comments and all of them are about this project + this is the Russian project and what a surprise - you are russian). All the ratings has explanations, if you dont agree, copy it here and oppose.  From our side, we understand, that we do responsible business. We always do a deep analysis. We checked a lot of interviews with a founders, they dont understand how google or facebook ads works, they dont understand about bet mechanism, they dont know how important is user data analysis in internet marketing industry and how costly and complicated is to develop it, they dont know that they use AI for they ads. How you can compete with them? Paying 500$ for add view? (Im serious guys, they promised to pay 500$ for ad view without action)  If you dont agree on some point in review, come here and oppose me. Im open for a discussion. I can say even more, if you make changes and improve your concept/ico structure etc, we will rereview this ICO.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Hey BitClave community, From now, you have a chance to review this ICO and earn crypto!  We value your opinion and are ready to reward you for it!  We’re now offering all users a chance to review upcoming ICOs on our platform for a chance to earn some crypto. This approach will be helpful for the project team, as they can hear some feedback from the audience     What you need to know: —The top 5 reviewers will receive rewards in ETH —1st place review is selected by ICObazaar (reward=0.1ETH) —2nd-5th place rewards are given to the reviews with the highest # of upvotes from other users (reward=0.4 ETH, split among the 4 winners proportionally according to # of upvotes) —Reviewing for upcoming ICOs is open up until the day the ICO launches.  Here’s how it works: 1. Register on icobazaar.com 2. Review an upcoming ICO on our platform — reviews are located on every ICO page under upcoming ICOs, here is BitClave page 3. Hopefully be one of the top 5 reviewers  See you there !

Author: Tyska
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Thank you once again, C3ALLtemp for comments regarding our project which obviously touches you deep.  Everyone from this forum can participate in the Bounty Campaign, we absolutely have no intention to buy/steal or otherwise relate to users’ accounts. However if you’ve got any proofs of account ownership you’re claiming please kindly provide it so we we could take it off from the campaign.  The user name “Tyska” is my own since the beginning. According to the Forum’s Rules it’s not prohibited to post in any threads on any languages… Our CEO Alex Bessonov is extremely busy with this project and isn’t able to monitor every post on this Forum. But you could be in touch with him by using a chat window on our genuine website.  Just a few more points on platform’ tech aspect. We don’t compete with Google in full as we don’t index the sites. We’re building product & services search engine. BitClave is playing two roles.  Role#1 is to build a platform that can be used to build 3rd party service and role#2 is to build the services. You can read more on a high level here https://medium.com/@BitClave/search-engines-in-the-era-of-blockchain-be29d6cb582. IPFS, FileCoin, Storj are technologies for storing the raw data, these are not the indexes. The raw data will be anonymized and open to all to build their 3rd party services - this is to attract more players and to make the BASE ecosystem better.  The BASE DB is used to provide BitClave’s services for search and ranking - this is where BitClave is playing it’s 2nd role. At this stage, we do not plan to give 3rd party access to the indexes, but we are considering to give API to 3rd party to use the search results.  Off-chain distributed storage is required because on-chain storage is much more expensive, so this is cost reduction technique we are considering.  Search results are given to REQUEST contract (which is on blockchain) and then REQEST contract can further communicate with OFFER contract to finalize the deal. The role of search engine is to provide potential matches and the final decision is done by the contracts themselves.  Search Engine can be compared in its role to a realtor in real estate business - it tries to match buyer and seller but the final decision is by buyer and seller. And you can have many of these search engines.  All providing “potential matches”. The REQUEST contract is going to receive a pointer to “recommended” OFFER and then REQUEST can directly verify if he “likes” the OFFER. The “recommendation” will come from multiple search engines, but neither REQUEST nor OFFER trust the recommendation so they are going to verify each other directly. You can provide your own search engine. You have access to all the information. This is important design point for BASE, we want to ENABLE 3rd party services, so all relevant information is stored in open storage.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Why would you not recover the password? Stop spam, please Information from the help page: Quote If you're trying to login to the forum but have forgotten or lost your password, you can retrieve it with the lost password tool. You can enter either your username or your email address so long as you check the appropriate option, then click the Send button to send yourself an email containing a link to reset your password. It's also possible to avoid the email altogether if you've set yourself a secret question and answer in your profile, but please beware of questions that anyone could answer or guess (like 'what is the first color of the rainbow?', which would be a very bad choice)!

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: If this coin/currency/whatever is being pumped by the massive number of spammers as it appears, it is destined to do nothing more than rip people off.  Any posts made by my account C3ALL, in this thread have not been made by me.  They have been made by a scammer that then appears to have sold it on to another scammer/farmer.  The signature that is now attached to my account is almost identical to dozens of others that are posting in this thread.  The scammers are even having "conversations" with themselves to try and pump this stuff up.  Avoid.  Like the plague.  Feel free to check the posts made by "C3ALL" here:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=189431;sa=showPosts  As you can see, I left crypto back in 2014 and didnt post again.  That is until October this year when my account suddenly started posting again.  It appears I lost my ability to write coherently in English too.  Then later in October, for whatever reason, I started posting in Romanian...    My advice, avoid this project, and avoid anything posted since 2014 by my original account C3ALL.

Author: Tyska
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: This information will be available during the launch of ICO   Quote from: Ai7xpressTV on October 22, 2017, 06:42:23 PM Is there a detailed business model available how you will try to attacke the market share of a well established search engine like Google? I really like the idea, but Google perfected its search engine algorithms over decades. Quote from: orpel on October 22, 2017, 06:53:25 PM Hi, What are you going to be your first steps in order to acquire some market value? We will not compete with Google in the search for sites. Only in the field of advertising. As part of the initial ecosystem bootstrapping, we have already introduced 15-20 small companies for the initial instance of the BASE market. Our team will continue to target industries where significant effort is put into marketing to individual customers, such as auto sales, real estate, hotels, and retailers like Target that compete with major ad service providers. Once our small market is established, we will increase our marketing efforts to continually expand the number of players involved. A lot of information about the project is in white paper https://docsend.com/view/84tv53w   Quote from: C3ALLtemp on October 24, 2017, 10:49:30 AM If this coin/currency/whatever is being pumped by the massive number of spammers as it appears, it is destined to do nothing more than rip people off. Any posts made by my account C3ALL, in this thread have not been made by me.  They have been made by a scammer that then appears to have sold it on to another scammer/farmer.  The signature that is now attached to my account is almost identical to dozens of others that are posting in this thread.  The scammers are even having "conversations" with themselves to try and pump this stuff up. Avoid.  Like the plague. Feel free to check the posts made by "C3ALL" here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=189431;sa=showPosts As you can see, I left crypto back in 2014 and didnt post again.  That is until October this year when my account suddenly started posting again.  It appears I lost my ability to write coherently in English too. Then later in October, for whatever reason, I started posting in Romanian...   My advice, avoid this project, and avoid anything posted since 2014 by my original account C3ALL. If someone uses your profile to earn stakes in the bounty program, we have nothing to do with this. Why are you accusing us of this?   Quote from: daniweb on October 24, 2017, 01:05:48 PM Has anybody heard anything about bitclave with their decentralized search engine project? Why do they use Ethereum blockchain instead of bitcoin blockchain? BASE system is heavily relying on Smart Contracts. Bitcoin does not provide such flexibility, while Ethereum is the most common platform today that supports Smart Contracts

Author: C3ALLtemp
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Because the very fact you need to advertise and garner support in this manner, appearing to actively encourage it at worst, and turn a blind eye to it at best, speaks volumes for the integrity of the program as a whole.  In fact looking at the post history of your account seems to suggest that too has been hacked/stolen/sold.  If the people behind this project had faith in it, they would post under their own accounts and not feel the need to try and artificially create trust by buying/stealing established accounts.   If I have a business idea I want to pitch, I pitch it myself, I don't go to the bank dressed up as Richard Branson and try to convince them they are dealing with somebody they aren't.  The only people who will make money from this project are the few who want to encourage the many to part with a small amount.  They know full well that the many will just write off their investment, its just like unsecured crowdfunding on a different platform.  Stolen profiles, the irony of "bounty" rewards being paid to identity thieves and all this behaviour circling a project that expects legitimate business to part with significant cash for access to data and pay for advertising, and you want private investors to pony up double what the EIB invested in Qwant.  OK, Good luck with that.  Just to note, in case you missed the bleeding obvious, the whole advertising model works for Google because of the data received from searches.  They can then sell companies very specific targeted data for their adverts.  That's why companies pay to advertise through google, so they can make sure their adverts are seen by people who are actually interested in their category of product.  Without competing on the search side, you are just selling blind advertising space.  What you are doing is recreating the yellow pages.  Im all for entrepreneurial activity, but to wake up one morning and decide you want to take on Googles advertising stronghold, with zero users and zero data input from millions of customers searches, and ask the general public to stick their hand in their pocket for $50m, is just daft.

Author: AlexBessonov
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Dear participants and members of our community! I’d like to announce that Official BitClave Token Sale begins November 8th, 2017. We completed a very successful token private and public pre-sale event that garnered a lot of media interest in this project, allowing us to exceed expectations by raising almost $15M and receiving commitments for another $24M. https://medium.com/@BitClave/official-bitclave-token-sale-begins-november-8th-2017-d023235ec60a  We are planning to change the token name. CAT is used by some project. We still can proceed with CAT, but before token distributed we can find a better option. Please vote! TON STAR HOT GEM BOX NUT LET BID FOX CAT COD KEY DATA SIM MSG Please choose two of them you like most. If you have other names in mind please share with us.   Thank you all for your continued support.

Author: wetlight
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: A lot of money won't hurt, but a minimum has to be raised (now, to fight the giants like Google, how much money do you really need to raise, billions?!?)  My main concern is, what is stopping Google to do the same thing (in a sense)? Google rewarding the end user for every search! And Google would just charge a small fee when the advertiser pays the end user!  Also, a lot of advertising is done in closed platforms like Facebook, Amazon (amazon pay per click), Instagram, etc. How is the coin (Bitclave) is going to get to these people? If you tell me Bitclave will pay the end user, then my reply is, so can Facebook, Amazon, etc. pay the end user and take a smaller fee!!  Just because an idea is great, doesn't mean that it will be easily implemented! (a great example is a few coins out already (in the exchange market) but when asked when their product will release they say it is still in alpha!!

Author: vitocorp
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: BitClave has announced a new partnership with Bancor to use Smart Tokens across the BitClave Active Search Ecosystem (BASE). BitClave reports it has joined the Bancor network and will become a member of its protocol family. The Consumer Activity Token (CAT) will be using the ERC-20 token standard, compatible with all supported exchanges and wallets, and will now also be automatically convertible to every token in the Bancor network in compliance with the Bancor protocol.  https://www.crowdfundinsider.com/2017/09/122578-bitclave-partners-bancor-smart-tokens/

Author: kamvreto
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Urgent Notice!!! be careful with imposter website  As the cryptocurrency market continues to rapidly expand, there are those who, unfortunately, want to take advantage of the people interested in supporting projects like BitClave. The BitClave community Slack channel is not alone in being plagued by malicious users who are trying to trick users into sending them Ether and Bitcoin, fraudulently claiming that they will receive CAT in return.  Recently, an imposter website has begun advertising through Google with the address www.bitdave.com - the lowercase ‘D’ looks like ‘cl’ so the address appears to be official website.. We are working with registrars and lawyers to shut them down, but until that happens please make sure to be diligent about confirming you enter the correct URL when attempting to use our wallet. Our website is www.bitclave.com. One way to ensure you always access the correct website is to follow this link and bookmark it, then use your bookmark to navigate to our site. Please make sure you help inform your fellow BitClave community members- this will help stop the scammers!  Note: BitClave will never send wallet address through Slack. Any and all transfer addresses for crowdfunding or other activities will only be provided through the BitClave wallet, accessible through www.bitclave.com. Once a Slack account is identified as sharing fraudulent URL’s or misleading information, they are removed from our Slack channel. If you ever have any questions about the authenticity of a message or link, you can always reach out to us through live chat on our website.

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: BitClave Token Sale Update  A couple of significant events happened during the last few days. To begin with, a number of leading blockchain projects showed an interest in our decentralized search engine. We are glad to announce our partnership with Bancor, that will considerably strengthen the project and expand BitClave’s community. And there are more partnerships to come. Moreover, we received a massive amount of whitelisting registrations which far exceeds the allocated number of tokens. We have more than 15,000 people registered for our whitelist.    Taking this into account, we decided to merge both fundraising phases and launch the full token sale in October. This will allow us to extend the whitelist and meet the demands of the growing community. It will also give us more time to work out the technical aspects of the partnerships. We extremely grateful to the community!  Make sure to login to your account and verify your whitelisting status!   https://medium.com/@BitClave/bitclave-token-sale-update-9ea4ef3beceb

Author: badinvesterguy
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: I could try..  How will you optimize results on your search engine? Google has had years to build it's PageRank classifiers from what I can understand..  there already are 10000's of webshops which can match products pretty good, so I wouldn't worry about that, although, my understanding is that bitclave isn't something like google, but more like google shopping.    How will you prevent advertising agencies from using the platform? What if a business doesn't have the resources to dedicate to contribute to the search engine directly?  Why would anyone hire someone else to do a simple job for them. If I can pay x advertisement for 10 euros, why pay a guy for 15 euros to make him hire that advertisement, as long as it's easy to use it won't happen that much. try this: If a lot of agencies start using this service (which isn't bad for anyone but the paying advertiser i guess) this service will only grow more popular, making it easier for people to notice/reach without the intermediary.   How long it will take, I have no clue

Author: Mandelliant
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: This is an incredibly complex issue, one that we're following very closely. As the regulatory and legal landscapes for blockchain projects in the US shifts, we're counting on a clear means to offer the same opportunity to participate to US residents that we're offering to those around the world. It's very important to us that we remain as compliant as possible to demonstrate the legitimacy of our project.

Author: Mandelliant
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: At present the transaction volume is not a limiting issue for BitClave (I can't speak to the challenges faced by VR on the blockchain- that sounds intense!). The Ethereum community is constantly rolling out updates that address load and scaling issues, so keeping our code up to date and in sync with the latest Ethereum updates is key. We are also working with other blockchain providers to see if there is a potential for a partnership where we could have tighter integration to address unique BitClave user load challenges, though this is a future challenge.

Author: Mandelliant
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: We are using standard Dapp integration for the time being. At present the transaction volume is not a limiting issue. And the Ethereum community is constantly rolling out updates that address load issues. We are also working with other blockchain providers to see if there is a potential for a partnership where we could have tighter integration to address unique BitClave user load challenges.

Author: AlexBessonov
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Sorry, we didn't address this question earlier. Our focus was on answering all the questions from the web site chat.  We checked the address above and it is not in in the pool of our addresses. SergFF, please contact us directly on the web site chat and we can check your account for you. With your permission, we will share the results of the investigation with the Bitcointalk crowd.  We can ensure you that all the funds are being accounted for and secured.   Quote from: magisterr on July 26, 2017, 06:38:08 AM They are so greedy.... No Hard cap? WTF... And Its just pre-sale...  Dear magisterr,  Sorry for the late response. We were very busy making sure that our pre sale event goes as smooth as possible  We have a hard cap defined in the system for the crowdfunding and it is 1B tokens. Please let us know if you have any questions. You can alway reach out to us directly on the web site messager.   Quote from: Orias67 on July 26, 2017, 01:55:34 AM Quote from: corleto on July 25, 2017, 08:54:33 PM    I noticed the same thing. Wondering what is going on here.  I was about to invest but I will wait some explaination I think...  I don't want to loose money again like it happened with some ICOs.  Dear Orias67,  Feel free to reach out to us directly if you have any questions. Hopefully, we answered concerns of SergFF.

Author: illiki23
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: I would like to point out that this project in no way seeks to build a search engine such as Google which indexes the web.  The search system is confined to their 'ecosystem'.  It would be neat if an ethereum based decentralized web crawling and search system was implemented, where you could gain tokens by offering your computer to crawl and index the web, but this outside the scope of this project.  The idea of using blockchain to record user interests to help with connect businesses to consumers is neat - but it will take quite awhile for this to result in an ecosystem of any significant size.   I am curious about what machine learning/recommender system technologies they will make use of.   (for everyone who thinks it is going to be a decentralized Google)

Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: It's strange and suspicious. There is no information on their site about gathered quantity of ETH/BTC and sold tokens. Also my ETH was transfered to the wallet https://etherscan.io/address/0xdb0c61c0110fa3469b28dca4341c6214f154b98f then (in 25 transactions) to https://etherscan.io/address/0xad08a68558e42ba14f04b57ad98bf357c4a5f10b. And it's still moving. What for? Any ideas? There is 3k ETH in total, but i think it's not only direction of gathered ETH transfer.  Subsequent transactions brought to the contract https://etherscan.io/address/0xfa52274dd61e1643d2205169732f29114bc240b3 And if I understand right, all ETH from this contract immediately goes to Kraken.

Author: GintoniK
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: The idea is good but the successful and marketable implementation seems almost impossible. The team seems experienced, which is the most important variable in a start up  They have had subtle publicity in quality media and they haven't overhyped the community like BAT did.  On the other hand, the pre-funding seems a bit fishy without the display of the amount raised and how far from the soft cap it is. The main ICO will happen somewhere in September but there is no exact date but what i dislike the most is the absence of a valuation of the project. How much are they looking to raise? Will the ICO be without a cap? Is there a minimum amount that needs to be raised ? What about security hard cap, even those hidden timestamped ones.  The slack channel is mostly empty and the chat is locked for security reasons; Telegram works but not for getting answers on your questions. I will stay out till more answers are provided.

Author: titan20
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: hi i have a few questions:  1. I suppose you can search the web with the platform. Does the platform itself do the search or does it for example return the results of google (like startpage.com)? 2. Is the CAT token necessary to be active/use the platform?  There are 2 billion coins. 1 billion for the fundraising. 3. is the pre ico sale part of the 1 billion? 4. You rate yourself at USD 100 million market cap. How did you come to this amount?  thanks and good luck with the project.

Catcoin is just a type of coin pow script whereas Consumer Activity Tokens [CAT] is an erc20 token that uses ethereum platform. What I mean here is the CAT symbol used by the BlockCAT project that also uses the ethereum platform as well. If you have an eth address on MEW (myetherwallet), you will find a custom CAT token automatically there and I do not know it is a bitclave or blockcat tokens because these two developers use the same symbol

Author: BitClave
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: Dear BitClave Community,  Thank you for your continued interest in this project! We are excited to announce the official details for the upcoming BitClave Consumer Activity Token Pre-Sale event.  SAVE THE DATE - Pre-Sale begins TUE 25th JULY at 11:00 AM GMT - Pre-Sale ends TUE 1st AUGUST at 11:00 AM GMT or 48 hours after soft cap is reached  PRE-SALE DETAILS - 1 CAT = 0.05 USD (ETH and BTC rate will change daily to match this rate) - $1.5m soft cap - $2 minimum purchase - 50% discount before soft cap - 35% discount after soft cap for the following 48 hours - ETH and BTC accepted  ADVANTAGES OF PRE-SALE Pre-sale participants get a 50% discount! This is a one-time opportunity to purchase tokens with as little as $2. This is a limited-time opportunity to own tokens before all the hype and to sell tokens a full price after the token distribution.  ABOUT THE BITCLAVE TOKEN DISTRIBUTION This token distribution is a unique opportunity to support a world-class team and ambitious project at the early stages of its founding by purchasing shares of the product platform in the form of tokens. Immediately after the token distribution, each token purchaser’s wallet will be credited BitClave tokens (CATs). At the same time, CAT will become available for trading on public cryptocurrency exchanges.  Register now using the fundraiser dashboard: https://fundraiser.bitclave.com/signup  HAVE A QUESTION? Slack: https://slack.bitclave.com/ Telegram group: https://t.me/BitClaveCommunity

Body: Our search takes Google out of the picture. The money goes directly from businesses to consumers and not to the middlemen. Please refer to our white paper for more details.

Author: julerz12
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: This is actually an interesting project! I like the idea of decentralizing the searches of eveyone. So, with this project, we say goodbye to google and bing? I hope it'll be a successful project! Pm'ed you sir AlexBessonov for my application on Translation bounty. Hopefully I'll be a part of this project, seems promising. Followed Bitclave on Twitter and Joined Slack Channel, username: julerz12

Author: TimeTeller
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Bitclave — The Privacy Is Yours ★ Important Announcement  ★
Body: That's a very ambitious goal I can say. But I'll wait how bitclave will really become the decentralized search engine that will beat google. Everything is possible nowadays. The once popular before becomes obsolete today. So let's see. This one is interesting if this will become a reality, especially to the users. Search engine that will pay you. Wow!
